text:
Dr. Irvin Stewart
-2-
10/2/39
Page 26, paragraph 3 - the reference is made
to a woardioid* type of microphone. This happens to be a
trade name of Western Electric and the text would be Just
as good if the word "uni-directional1' were used instead.
While we have offered some critical comments,
the paper in general is very good. The comments have been
only given in the spirit of helpfulness.
Cordially,
Frank E. Schoolsy
FES:JH
